lines.text: Hey, why can't I sing in da quartet? I used to sing in a quartet wit' six members!
I guess he didn't hear me.

[reading the card on the wreath of flowers the boys brought in]
'We didn't mean to shoot you Louie, honest'. You stole a dead guy's flowers? Don't you know that sacrelilious? Put them back... hold it, I guess it wouldn't be any more sacrelilious to put them back after the ceremony.

[to Glimpy]
Any normal person can get normal measles, but you gotta pick a fight with a Nazi and get German measles.

[to the quartet]
Now remember your crescendos and your de-u-endos.
I'm gonna send you to an optimist to have your eyes examined.
